pr_title: SAMZA-2448: [Scala cleanup] Clean up and convert some parts of samza-kafka to java

timeline.message: moved java files to java directory, deleted unused scala classes, added KafkaUtilJava

timeline.author: Sanil15

timeline.bodyText: Does it have to be boxed? Can we replace this w/ primitive?
timeline.author: mynameborat

replies.bodyText: I tried to unbox also, but KafkaSystemProducer needs the boxed type since it assigns the output of this method to a variable which needs to be nullable.
replies.author: cameronlee314
